B

BadCommandResponseException - Exception in fil.project.exceptions
Exception thrown when the socket does not receive a successful response from the FTP server after sending a File Transfer Protocol (RFC 959) command.

Constructor

F

fil.project - package fil.project
Contains the entry point related to the TreeFTP project, the Main class.
fil.project.client - package fil.project.client
Contains interfaces/classes related to the client FTP which initiates all the calls to the remote FTP server and displays the tree
fil.project.exceptions - package fil.project.exceptions
Contains all custom exceptions related to TreeFtp Project error handling
fil.project.utils - package fil.project.utils
Contains a collection of utilities classes/statics methods which can be use throughout the application
FileUtils - Class in fil.project.utils
FileUtils(Singleton pattern) used to manage the print of folders / files retrieved by FtpClient in a specific format .
FTP_PORT - Static variable in class fil.project.client.FtpClient
 
FtpClient - Class in fil.project.client
FtpClient used to display the tree structure of a remote directory(FTP Server) on the standard output of a terminal and contains all the necessary commands from RFC 959 (File Transfer Protocol)
FtpClient(String, String, String) - Constructor for class fil.project.client.FtpClient
Constructor
FtpClientInterface - Interface in fil.project.client
Defined the main methods necessary for the proper functioning of the FTP Client which are: connection, in-depth browsing, and disconnection
